title: Interview: Wheatus
body:

No, because (hopefully) in that time he wonâ€™t be remembered and popular music will have moved on. **Wheatus,** on the other hand, are a band whose music skims above the peaks and troughs of music fads. (On a different note, I think this may have been the last time in the UK chart with the majority of the songs on it were worth listening to, it included Limp Bizkit, Papa Roach and Fun Lovinâ€™ Criminals as well as yourself all in the top 5)**
